mapper.select: select A.RS_RequestNo, A.RS_ItemCode, B.Product_Item_Name RS_ItemName, A.RS_Qty, A.RS_Sum, A.RS_Not_Stocked, A.RS_Send_Clsfc, C.Child_TBL_Type RS_Send_Clsfc_Name, A.RS_Remark from RequestSub_tbl A inner join Product_Info_tbl B on A.RS_ItemCode = B.Product_Item_Code inner join DTL_TBL C on A.RS_Send_Clsfc = C.Child_TBL_No WHERE A.RS_RequestNo = #{OrderNo} order by RS_ItemCode
mapper.insert:
insert into RequestSub_tbl( RS_RequestNo, RS_ItemCode, RS_Qty, RS_Sum, RS_Not_Stocked, RS_Send_Clsfc, RS_Remark )values
( #{requestNo}, #{item.RS_ItemCode}, #{item.RS_Qty}, #{item.RS_Sum}, #{item.RS_Qty}, #{item.RS_Send_Clsfc}, #{item.RS_Remark} )
on duplicate key update RS_Qty = values(RS_Qty), RS_Sum = values(RS_Sum), RS_Not_Stocked = values(RS_Qty) - values(RS_Sum), RS_Send_Clsfc = values(RS_Send_Clsfc), RS_Remark = values(RS_Remark)
